STUDY: A genome-wide association study identifies susceptibility loci of silica-related pneumoconiosis in Han Chinese.
INITIAL SAMPLE SIZE: 202 Han Chinese ancestry cases, 198 Han Chinese ancestry controls
REPLICATION SAMPLE SIZE: 490 Han Chinese ancestry cases, 541 Han Chinese ancestry controls
